pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcoreTitle: Rehearsals, Coaching, Solos, Medley's and Choreography, Kids take NYC tour bus
pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcoreDescription:
Stage rehearsals at Burrows Theater with E and A camera
Sing "Fascinatin' Rhythm"
Kiesha Lalama begins coaching on dancing and choreography
Sing and dance to "King of New York"
Keisha move kids to correct positions, lines them up, jokes around
kids sing and dance to "Fascinatin' Rhythm"
Nicholas Wetherbee gets coached and sings "It's Your Wedding Day" - then sings "They Can't Take That Away From Me"
Carly sings "Pulled"
Sheridan sings "You Can't Get a Man With a Gun"
Kyra sings "Cute Boys With Short Haircuts"
Mostly studio 3 sessions onto "The Ride"
Nicholas Wetherbee and Evyn Mirasol get coached and Nicholas sings "They can't take that Away From Me"
Carly Moffie and Zack Kozlow get coached and Zack sings "I Chose Right"
Alli Kramer sings "There's More to the Story" and get's coached
Alli Kramer sings "The Life of the Party"
Peter Lambert sings "Everybody says Don't" get's coached
Billy Cohen sings "Come Back to Me" to Sheridan Hearn
Billy Cohen sings "I Want to Go Home"
Brittany Dankwa sings "And I'm Telling You I'm Not Going" to Nicholas Wetherbee
Brittany Dankwa sings "Rain On My Parade"
Kyle Conroy sings "Suppertime"
Kids are dismissed from rehearsal - walk around outside and get on tour bus
"The Ride"
Kids go on a tour bus ride of NYC
take pictures, goof around
Bus tour ends, kids line up outside on NY street
Brittany Dankwa and Shavance Stephens chat
Kids walk into Minskoff Theater
Kids walk into Sardi's Restaurant

instantiationIdentifier.annotation: may be a range of file names
